value:
$WmMPID_カタリナ,ch01_27_Katarina_F_Normal,Face|$w0|This way, Sharena. We're almost
there...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I'm right behind you, Katarina.$k$p$WmMPID_カタリナ,ch01_27_Katarina_F_Normal,Face|$w0|...$k$pI know your brother doesn't trust me.
You stood up for me, though. Why?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$w0|What's friendship without trust?$k$p$EFace_Smile|It's because we're friends now,
Katarina. It's really that simple.$k$p$WmMPID_カタリナ,ch01_27_Katarina_F_Normal,Face|$w0|...$k$pYes, I suppose it is. We had better
stop here, then.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Why?$k$p$Sbs1000|$WmMPID_カタリナ,ch01_27_Katarina_F_Normal,Face|$w0|If you continue any further, you'll be
caught in a trap that we set for you.$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|A trap?!$k$p$EFace_Pain|Wait a moment... "We set"? What do
you mean by "we," Katarina?$k$p$WmMPID_カタリナ,ch01_27_Katarina_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I'm so sorry, Sharena... Because you
really meant it when you called me
your friend.$k$pMy real name isn't Katarina. It's
Reese. And I was sent to kill you.
All of you.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|What?!$k$p$WmMPID_カタリナ,ch01_27_Katarina_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I wasn't supposed to say anything
about it, of course...$k$pIt was a simple plan. With everybody
distracted by the battle, my job was to
stab $Nu.$k$pBut after speaking with you... I can't
do it.$k$pNo, now... We'll fight you head-on.$k$pLegion? Clarisse? I'm sorry for the
trouble.$k$p$WmMPID_クライネ,ch01_28_Kleine_F_Normal,Face|$w0|"Trouble," she says. Making friends
with the enemy! Could you be any
more worthless?$k$p$WmMPID_ローロー,ch01_25_Roro_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Uwee hee hee! What a liars you are!
You saids "Dos what you likes!" That's
what she didses!$k$p$WmMPID_クライネ,ch01_28_Kleine_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Shut up! It's time to clean up this
mess.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_03,0|$WmMPID_カタリナ,ch01_27_Katarina_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Thank you for using your strength to
free us from the contract.$k$pSharena... I really am sorry. Truly. I
know you can't forgive me, but...$k$pHearing you call me a friend... It really
did make me happy.$k$p

$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|$w0|Oh, Katarina...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Sharena... Are you all right?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|I'm sorry, Alfonse. In the end...it
was just like you said.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|No, it wasn't.$k$pAnd that's because you did get
through to her. Katarina had a
change of heart because of you.$k$p$EFace_Anger|If you don't trust people,
they can't betray you...$k$pAnd if you don't trust people,
you'll never make a connection
with anybody. Not truly. $k$p$EFace|Sure, you might be hurt. Lied to,
tricked, betrayed... Played for a fool.
But trust is a beautiful thing.$k$pIt doesn't come easily to me, Sharena.
But it does for you. That is something
special.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Alfonse...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|I do hope we meet Katarina again in
our travels, don't you?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|Yes, I do! So very much!$k$p$Sbs150|
